medi:segment.medi:documentation: BGM, Beginning of message A segment for unique identification of the message type, its function, and the reference number for the response.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of a type of document/message by codeor name. Code preferred.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code specifying the document name.
Code identifying a user or association maintained codelist.
Code specifying the agency responsible for a codelist.
Name of a document.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of a document/message by its numberand eventually its version or revision.

medi:component.medi:documentation: To identify a document.
To identify a version.
To identify a revision.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code indicating the function of the message.
Code specifying the type of acknowledgment required ortransmitted.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, Date/time/period A segment identifying the relevant dates and times associated with the response. The segment must be specified at least once to specify the processing date of the response message.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Date and/or time, or period relevant to thespecified date/time/period type.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code qualifying the function of a date, time orperiod.
The value of a date, a date and time, a time or of aperiod in a specified representation.
Code specifying the representation of a date, time orperiod.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: ERC, Application error information A segment identifying the type of application errors within the message to which CASRES is a response.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code assigned by the recipient of a message toindicate a data validation error condition.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code specifying an application error.
Code identifying a user or association maintained codelist.
Code specifying the agency responsible for a codelist.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, Place/location identification A segment identifying the jurisdiction and court or tribunal locations associated with the response message.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code identifying the function of a location.
Identification of a location by code or name.

medi:component.medi:documentation: To identify a location.
Code identifying a user or association maintained codelist.
Code specifying the agency responsible for a codelist.
Name of the location.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification the first related location by code orname.

medi:component.medi:documentation: To identify a first related location.
Code identifying a user or association maintained codelist.
Code specifying the agency responsible for a codelist.
Name of first related location.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of second related location by code orname.

medi:component.medi:documentation: To identify a second related location.
Code identifying a user or association maintained codelist.
Code specifying the agency responsible for a codelist.
Name of the second related location.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code specifying a relation.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, Reference A segment to specify a particular reference associated with the response when required, e.g. reference number for a legal case.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of a reference.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code qualifying a reference.
Identifies a reference.
To identify a line of a document.
To identify a version.
To identify a revision.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, Monetary amount A segment identifying a monetary amount involved in the dispute.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Amount of goods or services stated as a monetaryamount in a specified currency.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code qualifying the type of monetary amount.
To specify a monetary amount.
Code specifying a monetary unit.
Code qualifying the type of currency.
Code specifying a status.

medi:segment.medi:documentation:
FTX, Free text A segment for free text information in coded or clear form, to give further clarification to the response message, e.g. the type of complaint, the nature of complaint.
4.1.2 Detail section
Information to be provided in the Detail section:

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code qualifying the subject of the text.
Code specifying the function of free text.
Coded reference to a standard text and its source.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code specifying free form text.
Code identifying a user or association maintained codelist.
Code specifying the agency responsible for a codelist.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Free text; one to five lines.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Free form text.
Free form text.
Free form text.
Free form text.
Free form text.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code specifying the language name.
Code specifying the format of free text.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 1: NAD-SEQ-FTX A group of segments identifying the particulars of a party to a dispute.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, Name and address A segment identifying the name and address of a party.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code giving specific meaning to a party.
Identification of a transaction party by code.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code specifying the identity of a party.
Code identifying a user or association maintained codelist.
Code specifying the agency responsible for a codelist.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Unstructured name and address: one to five lines.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Free form description of a name and address line.
Free form description of a name and address line.
Free form description of a name and address line.
Free form description of a name and address line.
Free form description of a name and address line.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of a transaction party by name, oneto five lines. Party name may be formatted.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Name of a party.
Name of a party.
Name of a party.
Name of a party.
Name of a party.
Code specifying the representation of a party name.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Street address and/or PO Box number in a structuredaddress: one to four lines.

medi:component.medi:documentation: To identify a street and number and/or Post Office boxnumber.
To identify a street and number and/or Post Office boxnumber.
To identify a street and number and/or Post Office boxnumber.
To identify a street and number and/or Post Office boxnumber.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Name of a city.
To specify a country subdivision, such as state,canton, county, prefecture.

medi:component.medi:documentation: To identify a country subdivision, such as state,canton, county, prefecture.
Code identifying a user or association maintained codelist.
Code specifying the agency responsible for a codelist.
Name of a country subdivision, such as state, canton,county, prefecture.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code specifying the postal zone or address.
Identification of the name of the country or othergeographical entity as defined in ISO 3166-1 andUN/ECE Recommendation 3.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: SEQ, Sequence details A segment to provide for the allocation of a sequence number (referenced in the GIR of Segment group 2) to a party involved in a dispute.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code specifying the action to be taken or alreadytaken.
Identification of a sequence and source forsequencing.

medi:component.medi:documentation: To identify a position in a sequence.
Code specifying the source of a sequence identifier.
Code identifying a user or association maintained codelist.
Code specifying the agency responsible for a codelist.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, Free text A segment for free text information in coded or clear form, to give further clarification when required of a party, e.g. 'trading as' and other legal descriptions.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code qualifying the subject of the text.
Code specifying the function of free text.
Coded reference to a standard text and its source.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code specifying free form text.
Code identifying a user or association maintained codelist.
Code specifying the agency responsible for a codelist.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Free text; one to five lines.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 2: DOC-GIR-PYT-DTM-MOA-FTX A group of segments identifying the particular details applicable to a court or tribunal order.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, Document/message details A segment to provide relevant descriptive information relating to a court or tribunal order (certificate).

medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of a type of document/message by codeor name. Code preferred.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Code specifying the document name.
Code identifying a user or association maintained codelist.
Code specifying the agency responsible for a codelist.
Name of a document.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Identification of document/message by number,status, source and/or language.

medi:component.medi:documentation: To identify a document.
Code specifying the status of a document.
Free form description of the source of a document.
Code specifying the language name.
To identify a version.
To identify a revision.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code specifying the type of communication medium.
Quantity of document copies required.
Quantity of document originals required.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: GIR, Related identification numbers A segment to identify a group of parties (via the sequence numbers allocated in Segment group 1) related to an order, e.g. all the parties that the order is on behalf of, or all the parties to which the order applies.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code qualifying the type of set.
The identification of an object.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: PYT, Payment terms A segment identifying the terms of payment, e.g. by instalment.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code qualifying the type of payment terms.
Terms of payment information.

medi:component.medi:documentation: Identification of the terms of payment between theparties to a transaction (generic term).
Code identifying a user or association maintained codelist.
Code specifying the agency responsible for a codelist.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Code specifying a time that references an event thatwill or has occurred.
Code relating terms to a reference date, time orperiod.

Count of the number of periods.

medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, Date/time/period A segment identifying the relevant date, time or period associated with the order, e.g. date order made, instalment periods.

medi:field.medi:documentation: Date and/or time, or period relevant to thespecified date/time/period type.
